title.rendered: Bypass the waiting lists and eat at the best restaurants in the world with OAD TRAVEL

content.rendered:
–  OAD Travel is the first integrated restaurant and hotel booking platform that guarantees access to the world’s most in-demand tables.

–  Launching initially with packages across Spain, OAD Travel allows guests to book luxury hotels alongside the most sought-after restaurants in the world including Disfrutar (Barcelona), Azurmendi (San Sebastian) and DiverXO (Madrid).

–  OAD Travel is brought to you by the team behind Opinionated About Dining (OAD), who have integrated their regional OAD Guides and Top Restaurants Lists with the travel platform to provide gastro-tourists with concise and  informative reviews of the best restaurants in Europe.

LONDON, Feb. 20, 2024 /PRNewswire/ — The first integrated restaurant and hotel booking platform, OAD Travel, has begun to offer packages in Spain’s major culinary destinations – Barcelona, San Sebastian and Madrid – for trips commencing February 2024. Plans for packages in London, Paris and Copenhagen, among other popular dining destinations, are to be announced later this year.


Continue Reading





Never before have the two linchpins of luxury holidays – hotels and restaurants – been combined. OAD Travel offers a seamless digital solution that simplifies travellers’ gastronomic getaways by taking care of hard-to-secure table reservations whilst securing rooms at the most luxurious hotels.

By booking a package through the OAD Travel platform, guests pay the standard published rate for their hotel room and obtain reservations at their selected restaurants at no further cost. Restaurant bookings include a minimum spend for beverages plus a choice of tasting menus which are paid for in full on booking. 

The inﬂuence of ﬁne-dining awards such as Michelin, World‘s 50 Best Restaurants and our own OAD Top Restaurants rankings can make it exceedingly difﬁcult for people to actually secure tables at these restaurants themselves. We not only take the headache out of getting bucket-list dining reservations, we also take care of accommodations at the ﬁnest hotels in town too…. and without adding mark-ups that would short-change either our guests or restaurant partners.” Steve Plotnicki, founder of OAD Travel and Opinionated About Dining

OAD TRAVEL LAUNCH – SPAIN
OAD Travel’s first offering will allow guests to book trip packages in Madrid, Barcelona and San Sebastian with a choice of premier hotels including Mandarin Oriental (Madrid), The Ritz-Carlton Hotel Arts (Barcelona) and Hotel Maria Cristina (San Sebastian), plus guaranteed reservations at a selection of restaurants including DiverXO, Smoked Room, Desde 1911 and Deessa (Madrid), Disfrutar, Enigma, Cocina Hermanos Torres, Alkimia and Lasarte (Barcelona) and Asador Etxebarri, Rekondo, Elkano, Arzak, Azurmendi (San Sebastian).

www.oadtravel.com / @oadtravel

OAD TRAVEL PRESS KIT AND IMAGES HERE

OAD TRAVEL – Facts at a glance

–  The OAD Travel platform launches in January 2024, for trips commencing February 2024.

–  Created by the team behind Opinionated About Dining (OAD), the leading source of global restaurant rankings for devout diners.

–  OAD Travel is the first integrated restaurant and hotel booking platform that offers guaranteed access to the most in-demand tables in the world.

–  The launch will offer reservations in Spain’s most popular gastronomic destinations including Barcelona, Madrid and San Sebastian. Subsequent destinations will include London, Paris and Copenhagen, amongst others.

–  OAD Travel Packages include reservations at premier hotels and restaurants. All restaurant bookings include a minimum spend for beverages and a choice of tasting menus.

–  OAD Travel only provides booking services. Special requests, such as food preferences, food allergies, dietary restrictions, or changes to reservation times must be addressed directly to the restaurant.

–  OAD Travel provides credit for food and services in the amount specified in the trip package details. In case a guest adds other hotel services, beverages, foods, or articles that are not included within their package, they will pay the restaurant or hotel directly.

ABOUT OPINIONATED ABOUT DINING (OAD)

Opinionated About Dining is the only dining survey that factors experience into its rating system.  OAD was created in 2004 by Steve Plotnicki, proclaimed the “king of the bloggers” by UK restaurant critic Jay Rayner.

Originally functioning as a blog to document his personal dining exploits, Plotnicki quickly identified widespread frustration with the reliability of dining guides on the market and recognised the need for a way to more accurately capture the movement of global dining culture. Today, OAD’s global restaurant lists and newly published OAD Guides are based on over 200,000 reviews contributed by more than 6,000 people.

ABOUT OAD TRAVEL

OAD Travel is the first integrated restaurant and hotel booking platform that guarantees access to the most in-demand tables in the world.  By booking a package through the OAD Travel platform, guests pay the standard published rate for their hotel room and obtain reservations at their selected restaurants at no further cost. Restaurant bookings include a minimum spend for beverages and a choice of tasting menus, which are paid for in full when booking. OAD Travel is brought to you by the team behind Opinionated About Dining (OAD), the leading source of global restaurant rankings and guides for devout diners, who have integrated their regional OAD Guides and Top Restaurants Lists to the travel platform to provide gastro-tourists with concise and informative reviews of the best restaurants in Europe.

Video – https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Gp_loU9ERhE
Logo – https://mma.prnewswire.com/media/2339563/OAD_travel_Logo.jpg

SOURCE OAD Travel

Originally published at https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/bypass-the-waiting-lists-and-eat-at-the-best-restaurants-in-the-world-with-oad-travel-302066238.html
Images courtesy of https://pixabay.com
